name: coa-mysql
description: COA核心MySQL数据库组件，包含基本数据模型、缓存数据模型、分布式ID等
author: Aex

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && cp package.json *.md dist && rm -rf dist/test
scripts.publish-prerelease: yarn build && yarn version --prerelease && cp package.json *.md dist && cd dist && rm -rf test && npm publish
